Wednus Scavenger Documentation

Introduction

Wednus Scavenger is a method kit encapsulates colorful user web controls and outputs Wednus Control.
  • WPS - Loads an arbitrary script file on the platform installation.
  • WOM -
  • WSS - Add an event to the corresponding event library.

Architecture

Usage

1. Including

Add following line of code in script block. 
W.control('A_Template');

2. Instantiate a control object

In either case, Wednus Platform will loadup the control, and now we can use the control like this: 
var myTemp = new W.A_Template();

3. Using object

After the object creation, you can access public member properties and methods as below. 
alert(myTemp.name);

Code Example

This example will print the installation path of platform. 
<script type='text/javascript'>
document.write('path: '+ W.path);
</script>

Test:
CodeExample.html
Warning:
Do not merge the two script blocks into one because the control should need to be fully loaded before any use.
